The balance in this account represents VAT owing to or from the HMRC. At the end of the VAT period, it is this account that should be used to code against either the refunds from or payments to the HMRC that will appear on the bank statement. Xero has been designed to use only one VAT account to track VAT on income and expenses, so there is no need to add any new VAT accounts to Xero
